Quizzicle

React.js

GitHub Repo Live version

Project Overview

A quiz application where users can test their trivia skills! Five questions are fetched from The Open Trivia Database for the user to select from. Once submitted, styles are conditionally rendered to show the user the correct and incorrect questions and the user can choose to play again.

Tools Used

React.js
State-Management
React-Hooks
Async Await
Fetch API
CSS
